author: trawick
msg: http_protocol: Escape request method in 413 error reporting.
Determined to be not generally exploitable, but a flaw in any case.

author: jleroux
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 604423

author: jleroux
msg: Now by default if an user is timed out user or has blocked the POS any other user can login.
This behavior is reversible using isSameLogin parameter in new xui.properties.file
Note that this behavior is not specific to POS and could be used by any applications using XUI

author: bibryam
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 604420
